sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import {Tr, Td, Flex, Text, Progress, Icon, Button, useColorModeValue} from "@chakra-ui/react"; import {FaEllipsisV} from 'react-icons/fa'; function DashboardTableRow(props) { const {logo, name, status, budget, progression} = props; const textColor = useColorModeValue("gray.700", "white"); return ( {name} {budget} {status} {`${progression}%`} ) } export default DashboardTableRow
